title: Rxn energy profile - entropy change of reaction

content.description:
The following questions relate to the below information.

XY2 → X + Y2 

The equation above represents the decomposition of a compound XY2. The diagram below shows two reaction profiles (path one and path two) for the decomposition of XY2.
content.question: The reaction is thermodynamically favorable under standard conditions at 298 K. Therefore, the value of ΔS° for the reaction must be

topic.text: 9.3: Gibbs Free Energy and Thermodynamic Favorability

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
